articles.title: China's unprecedented quarantines could have wider consequences, experts say
articles.description: With Chinese authorities warning the coronavirus outbreak is accelerating, placing millions of people in more than a dozen Chinese cities under intense travel restrictions might seem like a good idea.
articles.content:
(CNN)With Chinese authorities warning the coronavirus outbreak is accelerating, placing millions of people in more than a dozen Chinese cities under intense travel restrictions might seem like a good idea.

articles.title: Fourth case of coronavirus confirmed in US
articles.description: The US has confirmed a 4th case of coronavirus as the death toll rises to over 50 in China. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen reports.

articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen, Senior Medical Correspondent
articles.title: China says coronavirus can spread before symptoms show -- calling into question US containment strategy
articles.description: China's health minister Ma Xiaowei had some very bad news Sunday about the Wuhan coronavirus: He said people can spread it before they have symptoms.

articles.title: US citizen trapped at the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak says she's angry and scared

articles.title: The WHO should sound the alarm on Wuhan coronavirus
articles.description: As the Wuhan coronavirus continues to spread around the world, the World Health Organization's decision to hold off on declaring the outbreak "a public health emergency of international concern" is baffling.
